MajorClaims.MC1: its better that people learn foreign language in their own country
MajorClaims.MC2: it is better for people to learn a foreign language in their own country

Claims.C1: It is cost effective and there is a pool of opportunities available now to accomplish the same
Claims.C2: with the advent of globalization, one can easily find a teacher in their own country
Claims.C3: it is not possible for everyone to visit a foreign country to learn a foreign language
Claims.C4: it is very easy to learn a foreign in our own country
Claims.C5: technology has also played a great role in reducing the separation between learning a foreign languge in our own country

Premises.P1: In the earlier periods, it was not easy to find a teacher to learn a foreign languge
Premises.P2: in Indian sub-continent there are large number of centers opened for getting trained in variety of languages like french, german etc
Premises.P3: it requires large amount of money and legal formalities
Premises.P4: Students can choose any language from the set of languages available at a university
Premises.P5: colleges and universities have introduced foreign language course as a part of their curriculum
Premises.P6: highly qualified foreign language teachers are easily accessible in various schools and colleges
Premises.P7: A large number of foreign language courses are available online and there are various forums where people can discuss their problems on different foreign languages
